name: Industrial Metal
description: Incorporates the abrasive and heavy sound of Industrial into Metal, using elements like synthesizers and drum machines.

children.name: Cyber Metal
children.description: Originated around 1999, influenced by EBM and Aggrotech with more melodic and less repetitive riffs as well as harsh vocals.
